projectComments.text: I sent Huseyin and Ivan an offer for a new Die Splitting Machine in week 41
We sent offer on the 8th of October
Offer send to Eric on the 10/10
Offer has been send by Mehmet - More info been send by me to Ivan
Mehmet offered Alcomet to buy one (or two) old presses and replace it with a complete new EGE press line
Offer has been send on 07/10
Audit was succesfully done with a total score of 46%
Offer send to Rodolfo on the 01/10
Offer send to Rodolfo on the 10/10
Offer sent to Michel on the 10/10
Visit is set for week 46 to perform an audit
Offer was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer for a gas billet oven was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer was send for a partial induction billet oven on the 20/06/2025
Wefa sent their offer for coated dies to CANEX
Mehmet sent an offer to Johan for a 3-chamber single cell die oven in week 41
Sent an email to Roland on 09/10
Send an email to Lionel on 13/10
I have send an offer to Karthik - Maintenance Manager on 13/10
I have sent an email to Sammie on 13/10 with information - Andreas in copy
Sent an email on 13/10 asking to visit EGE in Istanbul to see some presses
Lionel forwarded the email to Erich and Samuel to evaluate the offer
Carlos told me that, for the moment, there is no interest - 13/10/25
Enrique will forward the info to the management - 13/10/25
I have send an email to José Leborans and Luis for feedback - 13/10/25
Offer was send to Claire on the 16/11/2024
Send email with approach proposal  - 16/10/25
Anna told me that she would come back to me in a couple of weeks - 15/10/25
Sent proposal for collaborartion to Heidi - 15/10/25
Arjan told me that he has enough stock until Feb 2026 - 15/10/25
David told me the price was right but die cost has to be discussed with client - 15/10/25
Offer is with the end client, Nathan told me - 15/10/25
Sent an email to Paulo asking for a update - 20/10/25
Sent Eric an email asking for reply - 20/10/25
Jason commented on the offer, telling us he prefers Infra Red Die Heating Ovens. After Mehmet´s reply, I asked him why he believes this to be the better option - 20/10/25
Sent an email asking for ok on offer and availability in week 48/49 - 20/10/25
Sent an email asking for feedback on the die oven and press offer to Karthik - 20/10/25
Sent email to Paulo asking for feedback - 20/10/25
Robert is discussing the offer with his team and will come back to us - 25/10/25
Replied to email from Fabio regarding the se-up of the training - 20/10/25
Sent email to Pere and Albert asking for their feedback regarding the offer - 20/10/25
Sent email to Pere and Albert asking for their feedback regarding the offer - 20/10/25
Sent email to Pere and Albert asking for their feedback regarding the offer - 20/10/25
Sent an email to Paulo asking for feedback - 20/10/25
Reply from Pere: no new investments will be made in 2026 in Santa Oliva - 20/10/25
Reply from Pere: no new investments will be made in 2026 in Santa Oliva - 20/10/25
Reply from Pere: no new investments will be made in 2026 in Santa Oliva - 20/10/25
Nacho told me that every new equipment seems expensive to Alucansa - 20/10/25
Nacho told me that every new equipment seems expensive to Alucansa - 20/10/25
Agustin told me that there is still interest but they have no idea when - 25/10/25
Nacho has no feedback yet from the client - 20/10/25
Nacho has no feedback yet from the client - 20/10/25
Nacho has no feedback yet from the client - 20/10/25
Sent an email to Ute (copy to Stephan) asking if there is still interest in a training - 20/10/25
Justin told me that he hopes to include it in the CAPEX for 2026 - 20/10/25
Justin told me that he hopes to include it in the CAPEX for 2026 - 20/10/25
Send email to Michel asking for feedback - 23/10/25
Training accepted for week 48 (26-28/22) on 22/10/25
Reply from Paulo - Some internal changes; will decided later - 23/10/25
Had a call with Bart - we will have a Teams meeting in week 45 - 23/10/25
Michel was asking for a price indication - I will send the quotation - 23/10/25
Training done. Maybe another training or audit will be needed in the future - 28/10/25
Festo profile - pick-ups on the outside of the profile. Check the gas N2 if this could provoke the problem  - 29/10/25
118355 232mm wide profile - is completely tearing on the outside part of the profile, during some meters and then it´s ok again. Billet quality or not using cleaning block could be the root cause?
Flugzeug profile - very low extrusion speed due to very thin wall thickness (1mm) and hard alloy (6082). Do not accept radius below R1 on hard alloy profiles!!
Profile 805437 - profile is tearing every time after nitriding. Could the shut-off (if there is one) be the cause of the problem?
Schlotterer 128784 & 100235 - First profile very tight tolerances & second profile thin wall thickness - Both difficult to extrude on an 8-inch press in 4-cavities
Billet quality, profiles tearing in extrusion, butt-end first billet P1 very small, dummy block quality (Castool), feasability new profiles (radius),
Cleaning actions needed - people not doing anything during extrusion at low speed or during downtime
Make plan to optimize dieshop processes and create training plan for personel not related to the dieshop
